description:
Olivia is a blonde-haired beauty who was born and raised in Japan, but can’t speak any English. Despite always acting serious and as an intellectual, Kasumi is a bespectacled girl with short hair, who also can’t speak English. Finally, there’s the pig-tailed Hanako, who’s cheerful but can’t seem to become a normie. The three middle schoolers end up making a “Players’ Club”?! The ultimately cute, ultimately fun and hilarious teenage girls’ comedy is about to begin!

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: ชมรมสาวรักสนุก

tags.name: Surreal Comedy
tags.description: Prominently features comedic moments that defy casual reasoning, resulting in illogical events.

tags.name: Slapstick
tags.description: Prominently features comedy based on deliberately clumsy actions or embarrassing events.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: School Club
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a school club scene.

tags.name: Episodic
tags.description: Features story arcs that are loosely tied or lack an overarching plot.

tags.name: School
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a primary or secondary educational institution.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Parody
tags.description: Features deliberate exaggeration of popular tropes or a particular genre to comedic effect.

tags.name: LGBTQ+ Themes
tags.description: Prominently features characters or themes associated with the LGBTQ+ community, such as sexuality or gender identity.

tags.name: Meta
tags.description: Features fourth wall-breaking references to itself or genre tropes.

tags.name: Ojou-sama
tags.description: Features a wealthy, high-class, oftentimes stuck up and demanding female character.

tags.name: Gyaru
tags.description: Prominently features a female character who has a distinct American-emulated fashion style, such as tanned skin, bleached hair, and excessive makeup. Also known as gal.

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/user/995498317)

Interested in films and comics from his early childhood on. After graduating high school he went to Yoyogi Animation Gakuin and afterwards started working as animator for [Ajia-do](https://anilist.co/studio/30/). After becoming a freelancer for a short time, he joined Logistics where he worked in the software development section and was responsible for animation work and later developing tools for animation work in games. In 2002 he founded [Team Till Dawn](https://anilist.co/studio/6412/), which was also the beginning of his career as anime director.

His hobbies outside of work include bodybuilding, in which he has gone as far as to take part in competitions

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/mtocoda/)

He worked as a music composer for Capcom after graduating from the Kunitachi College of Music. He left the company in 2003 and founded Design Wave in 2007, and is still working as a composer for video games.  He is known for his work on the Devil May Cry and Monster Hunter series.
**Iida Satoki** is a Japanese freelance sound director.

__Height:__ 159 cm
__Agency:__ Office Osawa 

[Profile](http://osawa-inc.co.jp/women/koharakonomi/) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/konomi_kohara0628/) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC-mDMYpO-cIimTdXreTQdpA) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/koharakonomiyt) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Konomi_Kohara) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E5%B0%8F%E5%8E%9F%E5%A5%BD%E7%BE%8E) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@koharakonomiyt)

She is a voice actress affiliated with Office Osawa.

- [Mona](https://anilist.co/character/209678/Megistus-Mona) - Genshin Impact (VG)
- [Arona](https://anilist.co/character/302229/Arona) - Blue Archive (VG)
- Soda - Goddess of Victory: Nikke (VG)
- Roccia - Wuthering Waves (VG)

__Height:__ 147cm (4'10")

[Profile (Amuleto)](http://amuleto.jp/talents/kinohina.html) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/hinappp8) | [Wiki (en)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hina_Kino) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/木野日菜)

She is a voice actress (seiyuu) affiliated with Amuleto.

On March 21, 2023, she announced on Twitter her marriage to a man not in the entertainment industry.

**Non-Anime Roles**
• Emu Otori (Project Sekai: Colorful Stage! feat. Hatsune Miku)
• Griseo (Honkai Impact 3rd)
• Moon Rabbit Cookie (Cookie Run: Kingdom)
• HMS Janus (Azur Lane)
• Sigewinne (Genshin Impact)

_Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/258364/)._
